abstract.text: Sets the current playback time within a specified time bound and invokes the specified block when the seek operation completes or is interrupted.

inlineContent.text: The time to which to seek.
to request sample accurate seeking (this may incur additional decoding delay).

The block to invoke when the seek operation has finished.
Use this method to seek to a specified time for the item.
The time seeked to will be within the range
Seeking is constrained by the collection of seekable time ranges. If you seek to a time outside all of the seekable ranges, the seek will result in a current time within the seekable ranges.

abstract.text: Work with audiovisual assets, control device cameras, process audio, and configure system audio interactions.
An object that models the timing and presentation state of an asset during playback.
Cancels any pending seek requests and invokes the corresponding completion handlers if present.
Sets the current playback time to the time specified by the date object.
Sets the current playback time to the specified time.
Sets the current playback time within a specified time bound and invokes the specified block when the seek operation completes or is interrupted.
A value that represents positive infinity.
A value that represents time zero.
Type to represent a Boolean value.
A value type whose instances are either `true` or `false`.
The return type of functions that don’t explicitly specify a return type, that is, an empty tuple `()`.
